id: satisfies a requirement for payment of some claim, debt, or other obligation
name: satisfies a requirement for payment of some claim, debt, or other obligation

id: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to clean up the definition and augment the restrictions on payment obligation to include the payee.

id: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO FND 1.1 RTF report to replace MoneyAmount with MonetaryAmount.
name: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO FND 1.1 RTF report to replace MoneyAmount with MonetaryAmount.

id: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to revise payments to better support loan requirements and eliminate duplication of concepts in LCC.
name: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to revise payments to better support loan requirements and eliminate duplication of concepts in LCC.

id: specifies the amount of money involved in a payment

id: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate remaining circular references.
name: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate remaining circular references.

id: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.
name: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.

name: schedule for delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation

id: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the FIBO 2.0 RFC to make hasPaymentAmount a child of hasMonetaryAmount and move hasObligation and isObligationOf to Agreements.
name: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the FIBO 2.0 RFC to make hasPaymentAmount a child of hasMonetaryAmount and move hasObligation and isObligationOf to Agreements.

id: a party to whom a debt should be paid, or to whose order a bill of exchange, note, or check is made payable, or who receives or will receive a payment from a payer in partial or complete fulfillment of an obligation
name: a party to whom a debt should be paid, or to whose order a bill of exchange, note, or check is made payable, or who receives or will receive a payment from a payer in partial or complete fulfillment of an obligation

id: an event that involves delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation
name: an event that involves delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation

id: Examples include coupon payment, loan payment, and interest payment schedules, among others.
name: Examples include coupon payment, loan payment, and interest payment schedules, among others.

id: delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation, such as to satisfy a claim or debt
name: delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation, such as to satisfy a claim or debt

name: PaymentsAndSchedules.rdf version of this ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).

name: the duty of a borrower to repay a loan, related to the legal right of a lender to enforce payment

id: This ontology defines basic concepts such as payment, payee, payer, and payment schedule, extending the scheduling concepts from the Dates and Times module, among others.
name: This ontology defines basic concepts such as payment, payee, payer, and payment schedule, extending the scheduling concepts from the Dates and Times module, among others.
